title: Bug 19651: Team menu disappears from Hierarchy and Packages view
description: It was there in step 9. Note: TestClass.java is not in any CVS repository, but I first saw the problem with a file managed by CVS.
OB: The team menu is missing from the hierarchy and packages view.
EB: The team menu should be present in the hierarchy and packages view.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Perform step 9.
2. Select the word 'InnerClass' in the text editor and press F4.
3. Verify that the team menu is not displayed, which is expected as it is an inner class.
4. Select the word 'TestClass' in the text editor and press F4.
5. Verify that the team menu is not displayed, which is unexpected as it is not an inner class.
6. Make sure you have 3 opened windows.
